department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture to Ottawa by March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
### T8082-220234 - Supply Arrangement for Office Furniture

**Reference Number:** WS3788816709-Doc3790502878
**Publication Date:** 2022-12-14
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-10 14:00:00

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) under Supply Arrangement

**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Commodity Codes:**

* Monitor arms or stands
* Tables
* Office furniture
* Credenzas
* Pedestals
* Freestanding tables
* Freestanding storage

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
**Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**End User Entities:** Department of Transport (TC)

**Contact Information:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
* Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada
* Representatives: None

**Notice URL:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14897465?extsite=MTQ4OTc0NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14897465?extsite=MTQ4OTc0NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Description:** This Request for Proposal (RFP) seeks to purchase office furniture to be delivered and installed in Ottawa by March 31, 2023. The full RFP and attachments can be accessed by SAP Ariba account holders with a Government of Canada profile. Suppliers interested in submitting a proposal must register for an SAP Ariba account and complete their Government of Canada profile.

**Eligibility:** This procurement is open to all qualified suppliers. Eligible suppliers may submit a proposal and be considered for this contract.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price
* Other evaluation criteria may be used at the discretion of the contracting entity.

**Award Decision:** The award decision will be based on the lowest price submitted by the eligible supplier. The contract will be awarded to the eligible supplier who submits the lowest price.

Additional information and requirements can be found on the SAP Ariba website. Interested suppliers must submit their proposal in accordance with the instructions provided in the RFP
